price: (2) Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish[669] that they had been Muslims.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: [669]- On the Day of Judgement or at the time of death.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
